portabout.para: NetBSD/evbmips is intended to be a port of NetBSD to various MIPS-based evaluation boards.

portinfo.portml: NetBSD's port to various MIPS-based evaluation boards
portinfo.portlinkitem: GXemul, a functional machine emulator which also emulates Malta.

portnews.portnewsitem: Support for Infineon ADM5120-based devices (specifically the RouterBOARD 153) committed.

NetBSD 3.1, the first maintenance release of the netbsd-3 release branch, has been released with binary distributions for 53 architectures. More information is available in the 3.1 release announcement.
Support for Atheros AR2315 and AR2316 based devices (specifically the Meraki Mini) committed.
The AR5312 port (AP30) now fully supports both WLAN devices.

Support for a variety of new platforms has been added recently, including expanded support for Alchemy Au1550, Meshcube, OpenMicroServer, and Atheros AR5312 platforms. Not all devices are supported on these platforms, but a lot of forward progress is occurring.
NetBSD 3.0 has been released with support for 57 architectures. More information is available in the 3.0 release announcement.

NetBSD 2.1, the first maintenance release of the netbsd-2 release branch, has been released with binary distributions for 48 architectures. More information is available in the 2.1 release announcement.
NetBSD 2.0 released with support for 48 architectures. More information is available in the 2.0 release announcement.
NetBSD 1.6.2 released with support for 40 architectures. More information is available in the 1.6.2 release announcement.
NetBSD 1.6.1 released with support for 40 architectures. More information is available in the 1.6.1 release announcement.
NetBSD 1.6 released with support for 39 architectures. More information is available in the 1.6 release announcement.

portsection.title: Supported System Models
portsection.para: Currently the following models are supported in NetBSD/evbmips:

itemizedlist.listitem: MIPS Malta evaluation board with either the 4Kc (MIPS32) or 5Kc (MIPS64) CPU board (running in 32-bit mode only).

RMI Alchemy based designs
4G Systems MTX-1 (MeshCube/AccessCube) RMI Alchemy DBAu1500 RMI Alchemy DBAu1550 (4.0) Plat'Home OpenMicroServer (OMSAL-400) (4.0)

Atheros AR531x based designs (4.0)
Atheros AR5001AP Linksys WAP55AG 2.0 Linksys WRT55AG Meraki Mini Senao/Engenius 5354AP1 Aries2
